mapper.sql: id, borrow_amount, total_fee_rate, borrow_interest, turst_trial, platform_licensing, collect_channel_fee, account_manager_fee, late_fee, renewal_fee, renewal_poundage, borrow_day, deal_flag, create_time, update_time, remark,status,extend_id,limit_id
mapper.insert: insert into borrow_product_config (id, borrow_amount, total_fee_rate, borrow_interest, turst_trial, platform_licensing, collect_channel_fee, account_manager_fee, late_fee, renewal_fee, renewal_poundage, borrow_day, deal_flag, create_time, update_time, remark,limit_id,extend_id,status,product_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{borrowAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalFeeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{borrowInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{turstTrial,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{platformLicensing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{collectChannelFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{accountManagerFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lateFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{renewalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{renewalPoundage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{borrowDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dealFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{limitId},#{extendId},#{status},#{productName})

update borrow_product_config
borrow_amount = #{borrowAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_fee_rate = #{totalFeeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
borrow_interest = #{borrowInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
turst_trial = #{turstTrial,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
platform_licensing = #{platformLicensing,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
collect_channel_fee = #{collectChannelFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
account_manager_fee = #{accountManagerFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
late_fee = #{lateFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
renewal_fee = #{renewalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
renewal_poundage = #{renewalPoundage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
borrow_day = #{borrowDay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deal_flag = #{dealFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
limit_id = #{limitId},
extend_id = #{extendId},
status = #{status},
product_name = #{productName},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update borrow_product_config set borrow_amount = #{borrowAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_fee_rate = #{totalFeeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, borrow_interest = #{borrowInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, turst_trial = #{turstTrial,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, platform_licensing = #{platformLicensing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, collect_channel_fee = #{collectChannelFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, account_manager_fee = #{accountManagerFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, late_fee = #{lateFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, renewal_fee = #{renewalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, renewal_poundage = #{renewalPoundage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, borrow_day = #{borrowDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deal_flag = #{dealFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, limit_id = #{limitId}, extend_id = #{extendId}, status = #{status}, product_name = #{productName} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id from borrow_product_config where borrow_amount = #{borrowAmount} and borrow_day = #{borrowDay}
select count(1) from borrow_product_config where borrow_amount = #{borrowAmount} and borrow_day = #{borrowDay}

select
from borrow_product_config where deal_flag = 'n' order by borrow_day,borrow_amount

select t.id, t.borrow_amount, t.total_fee_rate, t.borrow_interest, t.turst_trial, t.platform_licensing, t.collect_channel_fee, t.account_manager_fee, t.late_fee, t.renewal_fee, t.renewal_poundage, t.borrow_day, t.deal_flag, t.remark from borrow_product_config t left join borrow_product_config t1 on t.borrow_day = t1.borrow_day and t.borrow_amount <= t1.borrow_amount where t.deal_flag = 'n' and t1.id = #{borrowProductId} order by t.borrow_amount

select t.id, t.borrow_amount, t.total_fee_rate, t.borrow_interest, t.turst_trial, t.platform_licensing, t.collect_channel_fee, t.account_manager_fee, t.late_fee, t.renewal_fee, t.renewal_poundage, t.borrow_day, t.deal_flag, t.remark from borrow_product_config t left join user_borrowquota_snapshot t1 on t1.borrow_product_id = t.id where t.borrow_day = #{day,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t1.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 1

select id, borrow_amount, total_fee_rate, borrow_interest, turst_trial, platform_licensing, collect_channel_fee, account_manager_fee, late_fee, renewal_fee, renewal_poundage, borrow_day, deal_flag from borrow_product_config where borrow_amount = #{amount} and borrow_day = #{borrowDay}

SELECT a.id AS productId, a.product_name as productName, borrow_amount AS borrowAmount, total_fee_rate AS totalFeeRate, late_fee AS lateFee, borrow_day AS borrowDay, b.extend_name as extendName, b.extend_count as extendCount, b.extend_money as extendMoney, b.extend_status as extendStatus, c.limit_name as limitName, c.limit_count as limitCount, c.limit_product_id as limitProductId, b.extend_day as extendDay, (select product_name from borrow_product_config where id = c.limit_product_id ) as limiitProductName, c.limit_status as limitStatus, a.status as status, a.borrow_day as borrowDay, a.extend_id as extendId, a.limit_id as limitId FROM borrow_product_config a left join back_extend b on a.extend_id = b.id LEFT JOIN back_limit c on c.id = a.limit_id WHERE deal_flag = 'n' and a.id = #{id}

select id as id ,extend_name as extendName,extend_count as extendCount,extend_money as extendMoney,extend_status as extendStatus,remark as remark,extend_day as extendDay from back_extend where id= #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into back_limit (id, limit_name, limit_count, limit_product_id, limit_status, create_date, limit_remark) values ( #{id}, #{limitName}, #{limitCount}, #{limitProductId}, #{limitStatus}, #{createDate}, #{limitRemark} )
mapper.update:
update back_limit
limit_name = #{limitName},
limit_count = #{limitCount},
limit_product_id =#{limitProductId},
limit_status = #{limitStatus},
update_date = #{updateDate},
where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into back_extend (id, extend_name, extend_count, extend_money, extend_status, remark, extend_day, create_date) VALUES ( #{id}, #{extendName}, #{extendCount}, #{extendMoney}, #{extendStatus}, #{remark}, #{extendDay}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update:
update back_extend
extend_name = #{extendName},
extend_count = #{extendCount},
extend_money = #{extendMoney},
extend_status = #{extendStatus},
remark = #{remark},
extend_day =#{extendDay},
update_date = #{updateDate},
where id = #{id}
